item.description:
We are going to start a Happy Hour Series

and visit the places that donate to us year round.

http://www.pancholoco.net/

wil be our first stop.

This is a meet and greet geared to meeting new members and

answering any questions they may have and may

not want to ask when we are in our monthly

membership meetings. As well as just having a good time!

Pancho Loco  - Vernon

Monday nights 4-6 is Fiesta Hour

discounts on quesadillas, wings, and chicken  flautas

also Margarita Mondays-
$4 - 12oz Margaritas

 

Meet us at the Bar....I will wear my name tag! Sharon
item.name: Happy Hour Meet and Greet
